wishwaya prasaranaya wemin pawathina bawa mulinma soya gaththe 1912 di amerikanu tharaka widyagnyayaku wu westo slipar wisini. 1922 di aleksandar pridman wishwaya prasaranaya wana bawa nyayathmaka sakshi lesa penwimata ayinstayinge sapekshathawadaye kshethra samikarana bhawitha kaleya. 1927 di rusiyanu widyagnyayaku wu jorj lameyithri mandakiniyaka athi dura ha prawegaya aduwime rekhiya sambandhathawaya pilibanda prathama nirikshanathmaka gaweshanaya idiripath kaleya. 1929 di edwin habal prakasha kale siyaluma mandakini ekinekin aathwemin pawathina bawath wadath durin pihiti mandakini wada wegayakin aathwemin pawathina bawathya.

shri lanka yuda hamuda sewa balakaye panagoda kadawure mandalika sarayanwarayeku lesa katayuthu karana mangala samarakon ada tharaga karana mitar 50 rayifal pron isawwa ohuge wadath sarthaka prathipala gena dun ekaki.mitar 50 rayifal pron isawwe dakunu aasiyanu shuraya wana mangala pasuwa me tharaga isawwedi aasiyanu mattame dakshatha dakwimatada samath wiya.wasara 2006di pawathi dakunu aasiyanu tharagawaliyedi mitar 50 rayifal pron isawwedi lakunu 593k laba ran padakkama dinagath ohu 2010 aasiyanu krida uleledi lakunu 593k laba aasiyawe 5 wani kridakaya bawata pathwiya.
